about_the_game:
Teamcrafter is a crafting and gathering Roguelite!

Do you like risking your life, fighting big monsters to save people you don't even know? Of course not, you'd be crazy right!

An infinite amount of worlds to visit

  • Explore procedural biomes, caves, plains, forests, swamps, deserts, snowy mountains, windy places, magical caves, lava worlds, and much more...

  • Replay to the infinity ! More than a hundred of collectables, over 40 talents, 50 passive items, evern run is different and it's just the beginning!

  • Epic fights with flashy spells, epic attacks, inspired from old JRPGs mixed with modern aethetics. Enjoy an automated turn-by-turn combat system with everything you need to monitor the fight, your party and help them succeed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Example: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Fighting dangerous beasts, this ain't for you. You're living the peaceful life, armed with your tools and your craftsmanship, you're here to create weapons, armors, accessories to help adventurers win and risk their life. Everybody knows how to fight, but you, you know how to craft!
